```{r}
data_mat <- read.csv('data/student-mat.csv', sep=";")
data_por <- read.csv('data/student-por.csv', sep=";")
head(data_mat)
```

# Here we choose the best OLS model using model selection

```{r}
model_mat_1 <- lm(G3 ~ -G2 - G1 + ., data = data_mat)
summary(model_mat_1)
```

```{r}
model_por_1 <- lm(G3 ~ ., 
                  data = data_por[ , !(names(data_por) %in% c('G1','G2'))])
summary(model_por_1)
```
